name: Homme-Cheval Apocalypse 2020
description:
Global Game Jam 2020 at MTLGameJam, submission page : https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/homme-cheval-apocalypse-2020-4

The long awaited sequel to the critically acclaimed Mystere de l'Homme-Cheval (https://bouergh.itch.io/homme-cheval), Homme-Cheval Apocalypse 2020 is an action-packed 2D builder team fighter game where your goal is to repair your house while destroying the enemy one using kicks and punch, the best Homme-Cheval weapons., on bombs and bricks falling from the sky.
